response.overview: The final warning and interview with Dr. Chuck Missler.  For the first time in history, this team will unveil over four decades of study that uncovers the mysteries of biblical prophecies being fulfilled in the days that lie before usâ€“exposing unprecedented technologies that will expose the identity of the UFO phenomenon hidden within the realm of the unseen world.  Come join Dr. Chuck Missler on his last prophetic expose about end-times prophecies written in the books of Ezekiel, Daniel, Zechariah, and Revelation. This explosive documentary will include the expertise of Dr. Toggero Santilli (two-time Nobel Prize Nomination in Theoretical Physics), Steve Quayle (Author/researcher) and Gary Cole (Neuro researcher/film director).
response.title: The Distant Thunders
